ModMetaData.name: [KK] Warhammer 40K - Astartes Gene-Seeds
ModMetaData.author: KabelKabal
ModMetaData.description:
As the Horus Heresy rages across the galaxy, the Legions of the Imperium crashland on the Rim. Play out your own scenario as you take Loyalist against Traitor for the fate of all reality. Declare your alleigence by playing a Legion, or make your own Legion with your choice of Astartes Gene-Seed.
Let the die be cast.
